thread.section_title: Sports - The Patriot Ledger, Quincy, MA
thread.title: Live updates on the Bruins

title: Live updates on the Bruins
text: Live updates on the Bruins News and notes from TD Garden from our hockey writer. Comment Posted Oct. 9, 2015 at 12:01 am Updated at 4:52 PM Mike Loftus has covered the Bruins for longer than he can remember. He uses his blog to keep tabs on them, but he also likes to get outside the Garden to cover other hockey stories. "One of the coolest things about covering hockey in this area is the number of players who take the game past the high school/prep level," he says, "many in the hopes of one day reaching the pro level."
